trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：每位对手各失去1点生命。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。

trans-unit.resname: THS·28 | Scholar of Athreos | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She asks pointed questions of the dead who wait for Athreos, learning of life from those who are about to leave it.
trans-unit.target: 她向等待雅睿欧斯召唤的亡者提出各类尖锐问题，从行将离世的人们口中了解生命的真正意义。

trans-unit.resname: THS·29 | Setessan Battle Priest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your god teaches you only how to kill. Karametra teaches me to defend what I hold dear. That is why I will prevail."
trans-unit.target: 「你的神只教你如何杀戮，而卡拉美特拉教我去守护珍视之物。因此我终将得胜。」

trans-unit.target: 第四天，一行人穿越了漫无边际的宏伟石林，每座石柱仿佛都是精心堆砌而成。阅历最浅的阿瑟蒙妮感叹着鬼斧神工的奇景，但天尊知晓其中奥秘。她加快了步伐。 ～《塞洛亚特》

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: THS·218 | Opaline Unicorn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Purphoros once loved Nylea, the god of the hunt. His passion inspired his most astounding works of art.
trans-unit.target: 普罗烽斯曾经爱上了猎神倪勒娅。在激情的驱动下，他打造了最让人震惊的艺术作品。

trans-unit.resname: THS·219 | Prowler's Helm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prowler's Helm
trans-unit.target: 游掠者之盔

trans-unit.resname: THS·219 | Prowler's Helm | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature can't be blocked except by Walls.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物只能被墙阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: THS·219 | Prowler's Helm | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equip {2}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{2}

trans-unit.resname: THS·219 | Prowler's Helm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The youths prattle on about heroic deeds, but avoiding the noose is a feat more daring than their entire careers."\n—Basarios the Blade
trans-unit.target: 「年轻人互相吹嘘着自己的光辉事迹，其实单凭躲开陷阱这项功绩就足以让他们整个冒险生涯都黯然失色。」 ～剑刃巴萨瑠斯

trans-unit.resname: THS·220 | Pyxis of Pandemonium | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pyxis of Pandemonium
trans-unit.target: 魔异盒

trans-unit.resname: THS·220 | Pyxis of Pandemonium | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Each player exiles the top card of his or her library face down.
trans-unit.target: {T}：每位牌手面朝下地放逐其牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: THS·220 | Pyxis of Pandemonium | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Pyxis of Pandemonium: Each player turns face up all cards he or she owns exiled with Pyxis of Pandemonium, then puts all permanent cards among them onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {7}，{T}，牺牲魔异盒：每位牌手将由其拥有，且以魔异盒放逐的所有牌翻回正面，然后将其中的所有永久物牌放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: THS·221 | Traveler's Amulet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Traveler's Amulet
trans-unit.target: 旅人护身符

trans-unit.resname: THS·221 | Traveler's Amulet | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲旅人护身符：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: THS·221 | Traveler's Amulet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What we call magic is nothing more than hope crystallized into a destination."\n—Perisophia the philosopher
trans-unit.target: 「我们称之为魔法的东西，不过是希望最终的结晶。」 ～哲人珀里索菲娅

trans-unit.resname: THS·222 | Witches' Eye | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Witches' Eye
trans-unit.target: 女巫之眼

trans-unit.resname: THS·222 | Witches' Eye | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has "{1}, {T}: Scry 1." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有 「{1}，{T}：占卜1。」（占卜1的流程是检视你牌库顶的牌，然后你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: THS·222 | Witches' Eye | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equip {1}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{1}

trans-unit.resname: THS·222 | Witches' Eye | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The price of prophecy is a vacant eye socket.
trans-unit.target: 预知的代价是一个空洞眼窝。

trans-unit.resname: THS·223 | Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx
trans-unit.target: 夜天神殿尼索斯

trans-unit.resname: THS·223 | Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: THS·223 | Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Choose a color. Add to your mana pool an amount of mana of that color equal to your devotion to that color. (Your devotion to a color is the number of mana symbols of that color in the mana costs of permanents you control.)
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：选择一种颜色。加若干该色法术力到你的法术力池中，其数量等同于你的该色献力。（你的某色献力，便是由你操控的所有永久物之法术力费用中，该色法术力符号的总数量。）
